item.title: How to make hidden owner admin or mod
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

uhm. its all in commands.java you can make your own in there. but also. you dont need a command void/string you can just make it so its like this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("test") && playerRights== 5) {
c.sendMessage("TESTTESTTETTESTTEST!!!");
//or add what ever you want for that command :)
}

if you want to make your own command string/void goto commands.java and look for:

if (c.playerRights == 4) DonatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
And add:

if (c.playerRights == 5) HiddenCommands(c, playerCommand);
then search for:

public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {
Add this below that:

public void HiddenCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) }

Hopefully i helped. and if adding your own string doesnt work. just make commands that require playerRights 5. and done

Read full topic

sorry, i need more information do you want hidden mods and admins to have no crown but have commands? if so add commands for playerRights 5(hidden mod) 6(hidden admin)
and done. but if that doesnt help give me more information and i could help.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make hidden owner admin or mod
item.dc:creator: @koala_sex koala sex
item.description:
@koala_sex wrote:

is there a possible way to do this? im on a pi server. can someone give me the code iv got this

						if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[head Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Brodie")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=255>[Main Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Co-Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

Read full topic
